categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: A Imperial Safe House was used by the Galactic Empire on Naboo's moon of Rori during the Galactic Civil War. It was used by Officer M'Kae after the Battle of Yavin.

The Imperial Safe House was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Imperial Safe House was added to the game with the fourth chapter of the "Secrets of the Syren" quest line, released with the "Publish 21", on August 4, 2005. The "Secrets of the Syren" story arc was removed from the game with the "Chapter 1", published on June 8, 2006, due to the major changes planed for Rori with the introduction of the Battle of Restuss.

In the fourth quest of the "Secrets of the Syren" arc, the player had to choose to work with either Rebel Officer Wolff Kalos or Imperial Officer M'Kae. This article assumes that the player was affiliated the Rebel Alliance. During the hunt for Cal Handro and the Syren spice on Rori, Rebel players had to fight Imperial mercenaries in a Rebel Safe House to prevent Cal Handro to escape. If the player chose the Empire, he/she would have to fight Rebel mercenaries in the Imperial Safe House instead.
